features.title: Service Provided
features.paragraph: With the advantage of many years of experience in the technology field, we always bring many technology solutions to solve the needs of businesses.

website.title: Website design
website.description: Consulting to build a professional website according to the requirements of the business.

mobile.title: Mobile application design
mobile.description: Build applications for many fields on mobile platforms, from native (Android / iOS) to multi-platform using technology (React Native, Flutter).

consulting.title: Consulting technology solutions
consulting.description: Advising businesses on solutions to apply 4.0 technology to the operation and management process.

network.title: Network infrastructure consulting
network.description: Consulting network infrastructure solutions for businesses, remote connection site-to-site VPN, SSL - VPN, firewall security, wifi cloud system,...

about.title: About Us
about.paragraph: Established in 2016 with a staff of young, dynamic and experienced technology engineers. At EvoSolution, we specialize in providing new technology solutions and services to businesses in many fields..

project.title: Handed Over Projects
project.paragraph: We always work with the highest sense of responsibility, always attaching the responsibility of each individual on all daily tasks. Since then, the company is committed to quality with each product and service that the company provides, ensuring the interests of customers in the most reasonable way..

era.title: ERA . Sex Education
era.desc: Sex education system for children, updating information and skills for young sex education for families and schools.

itels.title: IELTS mock test online TESTURU
itels.desc: Online IELTS practice test and preparation system

timekeeping.desc: Time attendance application for businesses, manage working hours, late hours from which to calculate the total salary for employees.

joco.title: JOCO travel social network
joco.desc: Social network to share travel information: destinations, travel experiences, tours, restaurants, hotels.

takamart.title: Takamart
takamart.desc: App for buying and selling classifieds, allowing buyers and sellers to connect and transact online.

phuquoc.title: Phu Quoc Market
phuquoc.desc: Online shopping and classifieds application developed exclusively for people living and working in Phu Quoc.

technology.title: Technologies
technology.paragraph: EvoSolution members are always thinking, learning new technology and ready to accept the opportunity to hone more skills and experience. The desire for creativity is always present in every member at EvoSolution.

partner.title: Clients
partner.paragraph: We always take the goal and the final destination is the customer. Therefore, ensuring and fulfilling commitments to customers is always a top goal for us.
